ComicInfo.Summary: With the damage done by the gang of hooligans to the town's fence, a tide of death and destruction is unleashed on Marshville! Meriem must now help stem the advance of dozens of starving carnivores. Inundating the streets, they attack and eat anything that moves or doesn't move for that matter! Cavewoman must go on the offensive to once again try to save the day!
